name: plex
description: Plex is a media server and streaming platform that lets you organize and stream personal media libraries across devices. It supports metadata fetching, transcoding, apps, and optional premium features.
features: Media organization: Automatically organize movies, TV shows, music, and photos with metadata and artwork.
Transcoding: Convert media on-the-fly to compatible formats for any device or bandwidth.
Multi-device streaming: Stream to web browsers, mobile apps, smart TVs, and streaming devices.
User management: Create separate accounts for family members with individual watch history and preferences.
Remote access: Stream your media library from anywhere with secure remote connections.
Metadata fetching: Automatically download posters, descriptions, cast info, and ratings from online databases.
Watch together: Synchronize playback with friends and family for shared viewing experiences.
DVR functionality: Record live TV with Plex Pass subscription and compatible tuner hardware.
Offline sync: Download media to mobile devices for offline viewing without internet connection.
Parental controls: Restrict content access with PIN-protected profiles and content ratings.
Plugin ecosystem: Extend functionality with community plugins for additional features and integrations.
Media discovery: Get personalized recommendations and browse curated collections of content.
